name: Cybernetic Ghost Symphony
description:
In the far-flung, dystopian future of 2017, music is the ultimate weapon.

Mana, the lifeblood of the planet, is being siphoned from our world and used by instrument manufacturers to create powerful brass, strings, and woodwinds.

You play as Clara, a former employee of CLEF, a powerful MusiCorp. Can she uncover the secret behind the power of instruments and the mysterious disappearances in hypercity Stanza-16?

Along the way, you'll meet unlikely allies, such as Leopold, an ex-mercenary who was born unable to carry a tune, and Fanny, who works for a rebel organization known as Long Rest.

Features:

  • dynamic loading screens
  • Branching storylines with 2 different endings
  • Possible feelings

A game about contact for the 2015 Loading Screen Jam

People seem to be having issues with their anti-virus software blocking the game. No idea what that's about, but it seems to work fine when you tell your anti-virus to accept it or whatever, idk.
